name: kind of date a cute maw boi
name_original: kind of date a cute maw boi
description:
this is a beta i guess so there will be glitches... let me know if you find any.

-------

you're walking home from school when a cute little ferret bunny thing stops you.

it introduces itself as "maw" and seems to be blushing at you.

will you make friends or will you fail?

--------

made in seven hours for learning ren'py lol

Made in Ren'py.

Currently 5 endings, maybe 15 mins of playtime.
